attributes.action: stop more immigrants from entering our country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are allready too many immigrants in this country ,taking all the jobs and getting all kinds of benefits.The goverment needs to re,think about what its doing to this country.If there wasnt so many of them here there would be more jobs for the unemployed and people who are on incap.What about us English people are we the 2nd rate citizens now...???

We want something done about this. Put your own English peoples needs first...

rejection.details: Overlaps with the following petition: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Tenyearban/
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
